snippet.title: "Containment Zone" |Devlog| : New weapon: PP19 and teaser of new location -Highway passage.
snippet.description:
Like and subscribe for more exclusive updates on development progress!

Wishlist Now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2279490/Containment_Zone/

|Devlog| Added new Weapon: PP19 - Special Operations Russian made sub machine gun. Chambered in 9mm, preferred by Russian Spetsnaz for close quarters combat because of the high fire rate of the smg and the cheep and plentiful ammo.
-20 damage
-30 round magazine capacity
-full auto

|Devlog| Currently working on new major locations in the game as well as the areas connecting these major locations. The Highway area as seen in the video will connect the Soldanesti Forest to Soldanesti City and function as a passage way for the player. It is a wooded map with mid tier loot and high amounts of zombies and anomalies, with minimal remaining humans in the area.
